duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement medium/large scale Data Warehouse solution as a data architect
Hands-on development of GCP Cloud Native ETL/ELT services with deep understanding of BigQuery and Dataform
Operationalize large scale ingestion, processing, and consumption using dataflow or cloud fusion
Ingest data through API's or integration tools such as Mulesoft or Boomi
Utilize event-based architecture using Cloud Functions, Monitoring, Logging, and Auditing services of GCP
Integrate with SAP using Cortex framework on GCP
Manage Networking on GCP and Gateway connectivity
Utilize Cloud Orchestration tools such as Cloud Functions, Cloud Composer, and Apache Airflow or related

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
